job_tasks.phrase: Leverage the GCP stack to build robust and scalable features.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes building and maintaining software features using a cloud platform, which falls under traditional software development.
This indicates hands-on work with Large Language Models, a core component of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain a balance between speed of delivery and sustainable, long-term technology solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the practical aspects of building and maintaining software systems, focusing on both delivery and long-term viability.

job_tasks.phrase: Engage actively in product and strategic discussions to shape the platform's present and future.
job_tasks.justification: This describes involvement in higher-level business and product strategy, demonstrating an understanding of business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Offer technical insights that align with the company's broader goals and user-centric approach.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to connect technical contributions with business objectives and user needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Uphold Carv.com's standard of excellence in every deliverable.
job_tasks.justification: This pertains to ensuring the quality of software deliverables, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Proactively identify potential issues in the platform, ensuring swift resolution.
job_tasks.justification: This involves debugging and ensuring the stability of the software platform, a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement best practices to ensure the platform remains glitch-free and offers an optimal user experience.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes building and maintaining a high-quality user experience through software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, staying updated with advancements often includes understanding data aspects of AI and full-stack systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with a diverse team of seasoned experts.
Offer insights and recommendations based on personal expertise, while also valuing and integrating feedback from peers.
Promote a culture of collective learning and mutual growth within the development team.
Assist in integrating new members into the development team.
Share knowledge and provide necessary resources to help newcomers become effective contributors in a short span.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and full-stack development.
Encourage and embrace innovative ideas that can enhance the platform's capabilities and usability.

classification.rationale: The job description mentions 'Play around with LLM' but lacks depth in core GenAI Engineering tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning. The emphasis is more on traditional software development using GCP and general collaboration, making it too vague to confidently classify as a dedicated GenAI Engineer.
